column2: BRIEF-Renaissancere Holdings Says CEO Kevin O'Donnell Will Assume Responsibility For Ventures Business On An Interim Basis July 9 (Reuters) - Renaissancere Holdings Ltd: * RENAISSANCERE HOLDINGS LTD - KEVIN O’DONNELL, CEO, WILL ASSUME RESPONSIBILITY FOR VENTURES BUSINESS ON AN INTERIM BASIS * RENAISSANCERE HOLDINGS LTD - ADITYA DUTT, SENIOR VICE PRESIDENT, VENTURES, WILL BE LEAVING CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-Renaissancere Holdings Ltd Says Co Entered Into Investment Agreement With State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company June 5 (Reuters) - Renaissancere Holdings Ltd: * RENAISSANCERE HOLDINGS LTD SAYS ON JUNE 2, CO ENTERED INTO INVESTMENT AGREEMENT WITH STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY - SEC FILING Source text: (bit.ly/3757ABv) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Renaissancere Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of 5,500,000 Common Shares June 2 (Reuters) - Renaissancere Holdings Ltd: * RENAISSANCERE ANNOUNCES PRICING OF PUBLIC OFFERING OF 5,500,000 COMMON SHARES * RENAISSANCERE- ANNOUNCED TODAY PRICING OF UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING OF 5,500,000 OF ITS COMMON SHARES AT A PRICE TO PUBLIC OF $166.00 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Renaissancere Reports Public Offering Of 5,500,000 Common Shares June 2 (Reuters) - Renaissancere Holdings Ltd: * RENAISSANCERE ANNOUNCES PUBLIC OFFERING OF 5,500,000 COMMON SHARES * RENAISSANCERE HOLDINGS-STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY TO PURCHASE ABOUT $75 MILLION OF CO’S COMMON SHARES IN CONCURRENT PRIVATE PLACEMENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Renaissancere Holdings Posts Q1 Loss Per Share $1.89 May 6 (Reuters) - Renaissancere Holdings Ltd: * RENAISSANCERE REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2020 NET LOSS ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON SHAREHOLDERS OF $82.0 MILLION, OR $1.89 PER DILUTED COMMON SHARE; OPERATING INCOME AVAILABLE TO COMMON SHAREHOLDERS OF $33.4 MILLION, OR $0.76 PER DILUTED COMMON SHARE * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $4.16 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $896.3 MILLION VERSUS $807.1 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Renaissancere Holdings Ltd Announces Annual Increase In Quarterly Dividend Feb 7 (Reuters) - Renaissancere Holdings Ltd: * . ANNOUNCES TWENTY-FIFTH CONSECUTIVE ANNUAL INCREASE IN QUARTERLY DIVIDEND * SETS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.35PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Tokio Marine Holdings To Sell Core Reinsurance Units In Europe To Renaissancere Holdings - Nikkei Oct 31 (Reuters) - Nikkei: * TOKIO MARINE HOLDINGS PLANS TO SELL ITS CORE REINSURANCE SUBSIDIARIES IN EUROPE TO RENAISSANCERE HOLDINGS FOR AN ESTIMATED $1.5 BILLION - NIKKEI * DEAL INCLUDES ALL SHARES IN SWITZERLAND-BASED TOKIO MILLENNIUM RE, AS WELL AS OWNERSHIP OF TOKIO MILLENNIUM RE (UK) - NIKKEI Source text : [s.nikkei.com/2Q7AxDI] Further company coverage:

Alert and brief on Renaissancere Holdings filing for non timely 10-Q withdrawn (May 16) The alert and brief on Renaissancere Holdings Ltd filing for a non-timely 10-Q are wrong and have been withdrawn. The company had last filed a 10-Q on May 2. There will be no substitute.

BRIEF-RenaissanceRe Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.42 May 1 (Reuters) - RenaissanceRe Holdings Ltd: * RENAISSANCERE REPORTS NET INCOME OF $56.7 MILLION FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2018, OR $1.42 PER DILUTED COMMON SHARE; QUARTERLY OPERATING INCOME OF $135.2 MILLION OR $3.40 PER DILUTED COMMON SHARE * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.62 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * GROSS PREMIUMS WRITTEN INCREASED BY $237.6 MILLION, OR 25.8%, TO $1.2 BILLION, IN Q1 OF 2018, COMPARED TO Q1 OF 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
